Name: NOOP
Description: No operation

Name: PUSH_INT
Description: Push an immediate 32-bit integer value

Name: PUSH_STR
Description: Push a string reference (offset into String Pool)

Name: LOAD_VAR
Description: Load a variable from host context

Name: LOAD_FIELD
Description: Get a field from an object reference

Name: EQ
Description: Pop two values, push 1 if equal

Name: NEQ
Description: Pop two values, push 1 if not equal

Name: GT
Description: Pop a and b, push 1 if a > b

Name: GTE
Description: Pop a and b, push 1 if a >= b

Name: LT
Description: Pop a and b, push 1 if a < b

Name: LTE
Description: Pop a and b, push 1 if a <= b

Name: AND
Description: Pop two booleans, push their logical AND

Name: OR
Description: Pop two booleans, push their logical OR

Name: NOT
Description: Pop a boolean, push its logical NOT

Name: CONTAINS
Description: Check if string/array contains value

Name: MATCHES
Description: Check if string matches regex pattern

Name: STARTS_WITH
Description: Check if string starts with prefix

Name: ENDS_WITH
Description: Check if string ends with suffix

Name: LEN
Description: Push the length of a string or array

Name: GET
Description: Get an element from array at index

Name: IS_NULL
Description: Push 1 if value is null/undefined

Name: IS_DEFINED
Description: Push 1 if value is not null/undefined

Name: IS_CONFIRMED
Description: Check if entity data is confirmed

Name: CALL_PRED
Description: Call another predicate by 16-bit ID

Name: RET
Description: Return boolean and terminate execution
